name: Asenath Peabody
occupation: Records Clerk at Arkham City Hall
traits: Wears her hair in a tight bun, peers over her spectacles, speaks in a perpetual whisper.
motivation: To keep the city's records perfectly ordered and to avoid any kind of trouble or attention.
secret: She knows the 'official' records are often falsified, especially birth and death certificates from old Arkham families. She keeps a private, coded ledger of the discrepancies.
hook: The investigators are researching property deeds, family histories, or old city ordinances.
